entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
